meta.content: In order to provide our community, parents, students, and staff with information on COVID-19, we have provided the following link: https://www.npaschools.org/COVID-19.

div.class: block block-views block-alerts-block-1 block-views-alerts-block-1 odd block-without-title

div.p: Distance Learning Instruction will continue for all students through the end of the 2019-20 academic year, per the Governor's order.

The Fitness and Aquatic Center will be closed starting Monday, March 16 until further notice. Members, please watch emails for further communication. If you are not receiving email notifications from the FAC, please email us at fitandaqua@isd721.org to get signed up for notifications.

div.class: block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title
node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-bbell odd clearfix

p.img: In order to provide our community, parents, students, and staff with information on COVID-19, novel coronavirus, as it pertains to New Prague Area Schools, we are providing the COVID-19 "Coronavirus" Information Center. The COVID-19 "Coronavirus" Information Center includes response plan information, links to current and past communications, a "Frequently Asked Questions" section, and links to relevant external COVID-19 resources. The COVID-19 "Coronavirus" Information Center will be updated with current information as it becomes available.

div.p: Please visit, bookmark and share the COVID-19 "Coronavirus" Information Center with the following link: https://www.npaschools.org/COVID-19.

Meals will be available in a "drive-thru" format at either Falcon Ridge Elementary or Eagle View Elementary between the hours of 11:00am - 12:00pm. Both breakfast & lunch will be provided at the same time. These meals are intended for children school-age and younger and will be free of charge for all, regardless of free or reduced-price status.
If picking up meals at either of these locations during this time is a hardship, please contact Kim Harren, Nutrition Services Director, at kharren@isd721.org.

p.strong: Meals will not be available during Spring Break.

div.p: We have posted a Distance Learning Parent Guide here,
As defined by MDE: Students engaging in distance learning have access to appropriate educational materials and receive daily interaction with their licensed teacher(s).
